actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of a week as National Lupus Week.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating the week of September 12 - 18, 1976, as "National Lupus Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of a week as National Lupus Week.
